item.title: Nagios check scripts
item.description:
Last week I added some of my Nagios check scripts to my nagios-scripts GitHub repository. Perhaps they’ll be of some use to some other people…

  • check_1wire_temps.php
    • quick and dirty, built for one specific application, but a good starting place for checking Dallas 1-wire temperatures via OWFS.
  • check_802dot11.php …
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: Web Traffic for JasonAntman.com - Webalizer, Site Maps
item.description: I’ve been working on the design of a town council campaign site for a friend - www.mikennick08.com. It’s hosted by an additional Apache vhost on my personal server (and running off of port 10015 - ugh). I setup Webalizer for him, so I figured I’d give my …
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: Website, Blog, Bacula
item.description: Website - In personal news, I’ve finished migrating all of the information content of JasonAntman.com to a wiki, based on MediaWiki. I’m still getting some kinks ironed out, and working on customization, but it seems to be coming along very well. It’s wonderfully easy to update information …
